providerConfirmation.disableProviderDescription: If you disable this provider, users cannot access its enabled models.
providerConfirmation.acceptTermsAndPrivacy: I accept the <termsLink>additional Terms of Service</termsLink>.
providerConfirmation.mistralProviderHint: Additionally, Mistral's OCR model is used to analyze uploaded PDF files and provide a better result compared to regular OCR tools.

deletePermittedModel.title: Delete Permitted Model
deletePermittedModel.description: Are you sure you want to delete this permitted model? If you delete an embedding model, all sources associated with it will be deleted. If you delete a language model, all threads associated with it will fall back to another model.
deletePermittedModel.error: Failed to remove model access. Please try again.

createPermittedProvider.error: Failed to add provider. Please try again.

deletePermittedProvider.error: Failed to remove provider access. Please try again.

createPermittedModel.multipleEmbeddingModelsNotAllowed: Only one embedding model can be created per organization.

createPermittedModel.error: An error occurred while creating the permitted model.

updatePermittedModel.notFound: The permitted model was not found.
updatePermittedModel.error: An error occurred while updating the permitted model.

defaultModel.title: Organization default model
defaultModel.description: Choose which permitted model should be used as the default for your organization.
defaultModel.label: Default model
defaultModel.helper: Users will start with this model unless they select a different one.
defaultModel.empty: Enable at least one model to set an organization default.
defaultModel.error: Unable to update the organization default model.
